title: Where are the right-of-ways in Pender County?
text:
The closest park in the Hampstead area is the Hampstead Kiwanis Park

at 586 Sloop Point Loop Road, Hampstead. It's a relatively new
facility.



Here are some other links to direct you to other parks in Pender, New
Hanover and Brunswick counties and a link to boat ramp locations.

Hope this helps.



http://www.myreporter.com/?p=131&page=6



http://www.myreporter.com/?p=221
